Key Match Events: Willy Adames hit a three-run home run in the first inning
Pável Pagés hit two home runs for the Cardinals
Johan Chourio hit a grand slam in the sixth inning for the Brewers
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played at American Family Field in Milwaukee, Wisconsin
The series is currently 2-1 in favor of the Brewers
Others: Freddy Peralta earned the win for the Brewers, improving his record to 11-9
Andre Pallante took the loss for the Cardinals, dropping his record to 8-8
